configurationGuide: To configure GitHub secrets for browser authentication:
1. Go to your repository Settings > Secrets and variables > Actions
- CLAUDE_ORG_ID: Your Claude.ai organization ID (UUID format)
- CLAUDE_USER_ID: Your Claude.ai user ID (UUID format)
3. Extract these values from your browser cookies while logged into Claude.ai

recommendations: Extract fresh cookies from an active Claude.ai browser session
Configure missing GitHub secrets for CI/CD browser authentication
To configure GitHub secrets for browser authentication:
1. Go to your repository Settings > Secrets and variables > Actions
- CLAUDE_ORG_ID: Your Claude.ai organization ID (UUID format)
- CLAUDE_USER_ID: Your Claude.ai user ID (UUID format)
3. Extract these values from your browser cookies while logged into Claude.ai
Set up automated cookie health monitoring for proactive management

alerts.message: Multiple cookies missing or invalid - browser authentication will fail
alerts.action: Update all Claude.ai session cookies immediately
